name: Bad Voltage
tagline: Bad Voltage podcast client for SailfishOS
body:
### Welcome to the Bad Voltage app for SailfishOS

This is a [Bad Voltage](http://www.badvoltage.org) client app for SailfishOS.


### Current Features

* Listing available Episodes from RSS
* View details of one particular episode
* Mark episodes as seen
* Stream episode from internet
* Download episode for offline listening
* Cover actions to resume/pause playback and reload rss
* Shortcut to the Bad Voltage Community Page


### Download

You can download the app from [OpenRepos](https://openrepos.net/content/scharel/bad-voltage) or from Jolla store.

### Support

[Bad Voltage Community Thread](http://community.badvoltage.org/t/bad-voltage-app-for-jolla-sailfishos)

[Bug tracker](https://github.com/scharel/harbour-badvoltage/issues?state=open)
